edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.inference
Class ArgumentInferences

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.inference.ArgumentInferences

public class ArgumentInferences
extends java.lang.Object

Handles inferencing (evaluation, error checking...) when the argument or someone associated with it is modified.

Author:
jburge

Method Detail

updateArgument

public java.util.Vector<RationaleStatus> updateArgument(Argument arg,
                                                        boolean deleting)
Updates an argument when a related rationale element is modified/deleted

Parameters:
arg - - our argument
deleting - - true if the update is the argument being deleted
Returns:
a vector containing new status information to be displayed

argumentStatistics

public java.util.Vector<CommonArgument> argumentStatistics(RationaleElementType type,
                                                           boolean selected)
Used in by the common argument display to show which arguments appear the most often. This returns a vector of arguments that match the type passed in. If selected is true, only arguments for selected alternatives are passed in.

Parameters:
type - - the type of argument - argument, claim, ontology entry
selected - - true if we only care about arguments for selected alternatives
Returns:
vector of type "CommonArgument" which indicates argument, total count, count for and against
